languages.text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} scored by the Rogue Trader's party inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10). In addition, all {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies is increased by +1 for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}.{br}
///Dogmatic — Adherent -//
languages.original_text:
В первом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} боя все {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критические попадания{/g} отряда Вольного Торговца накладывают на цели {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (10). Кроме того, весь {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненный урон{/g}, получаемый врагами, увеличивается на 1 за каждый ранг {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}убеждения{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g}.{br}
///Догматик — сторонник -//

traits.locale_text: In the first round of combat all critical hits of the Rogue Trader's party make targets burning. In addition, all fire damage suffered by enemies is increased by +1 for each Conviction: Imperialis rank.{br} ///Imperialis — Adherent -// Burning: At the start of every turn the affected target suffers 10 damage and makes an Agility resistance test with a −10 penalty to stop burning.

languages.text:
В первом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g} боя все {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критические попадания{/g} отряда Вольного Торговца накладывают на цели {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (10). Кроме того, весь {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненный урон{/g}, получаемый врагами, увеличивается на 1 за каждый ранг {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}убеждения{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g}.{br}
///Догматик — сторонник -//

In der ersten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} des Kampfes verursachen alle {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} der Gruppe {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (10). Außerdem erhöht sich der {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} von Gegnern für jeden Rang von {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Überzeugung{/g} – {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g} um +1.{br}
///Dogmatiker – Anhänger -//
languages.original_text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} scored by the Rogue Trader's party inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10). In addition, all {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies is increased by +1 for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}.{br}
///Dogmatic — Adherent -//

languages.text:
Au premier {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de combat, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coups critiques{/g} portés par le groupe {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} infligent des dégâts de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}combustion{/g} (10). En outre, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} subis par les ennemis augmentent de +1 par rang de {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} : {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g}.{br}
///Dogmatique — Partisan -//
languages.original_text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} scored by the Rogue Trader's party inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10). In addition, all {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies is increased by +1 for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}.{br}
///Dogmatic — Adherent -//

languages.text:
每场战斗的首{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，行商浪人一方造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}都会附带{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g} （10） 效果。此外，每有1级“{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}信念{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}”等级，敌人承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}都会提高1点。{br}
///教条主义——拥护者-//
languages.original_text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} scored by the Rogue Trader's party inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10). In addition, all {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies is increased by +1 for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}.{br}
///Dogmatic — Adherent -//

languages.text:
Durante el primer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} del combate, todos los {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impactos críticos{/g} asestados por el grupo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente infligen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (10). Además, todo el {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} que sufren los enemigos aumenta en +1 por cada rango de {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Convicción{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}.{br}
///Dogmático: Partidario -//
languages.original_text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} scored by the Rogue Trader's party inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10). In addition, all {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies is increased by +1 for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}.{br}
///Dogmatic — Adherent -//

languages.text:
戦闘の最初の{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、自由開拓者の部隊によるすべての{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g} (10) を付与するようになる。さらに、敵が受けるすべての{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}信念{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g}のランク1ごとに+1増加する。{br}
///教条主義 ― 門下生-//
languages.original_text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} scored by the Rogue Trader's party inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10). In addition, all {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies is increased by +1 for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}.{br}
///Dogmatic — Adherent -//

languages.text:
Çatışmanın ilk {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raundunda{/g} Hür Tacir'in grubunun yaptığı tüm {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşlar{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanmaya{/g} (10) sebep olur. Ek olarak düşmanların maruz kaldığı tüm {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarı{/g}, her bir {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Kanaat{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatik{/g} kademesi için +1 artar.{br}
///Dogmatik — Taraftar -//
languages.original_text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} scored by the Rogue Trader's party inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10). In addition, all {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies is increased by +1 for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}.{br}
///Dogmatic — Adherent -//

languages.text:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} scored by the Rogue Trader's party inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10). To stop burning, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. In addition, all {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} suffered by enemies is increased by +1 for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}.{br}
///Dogmatic — Adherent -//
